title: API Integration Guide
content: To integrate our API, first authenticate using OAuth 2.0. The base endpoint is https://api.example.com/v1. Use the /auth endpoint to get your bearer token. For rate limiting, we allow 1000 requests per hour per API key.

title: Debugging Common SDK Issues
content: Common SDK issues include timeout errors and authentication failures. Check your network configuration and ensure your API keys are properly configured. Enable debug logging for detailed error information.
